Language.name: m4
Language.keyword: \b(?: argn | builtin | capitalize | changecom | changequote | changeword | cleardivert | cond | copy | curry | debugfile | debugmode | decr | define | define_blind | defn | divert | divnum | dquote | dquote_elt | downcase | dumpdef | errprint | esyscmd | eval | fatal_error | foreach | foreachq | forloop | format | ifdef | ifelse | include | incr | index | indir | join | joinall | len | m4exit | m4wrap | maketemp | mkstemp | patsubst | popdef | pushdef | quote | rename | regexp | reverse | shift | sinclude | stack_foreach | stack_foreach_lifo | substr | syscmd | sysval | traceoff | traceon | translit | undefine | undivert | upcase)\b
\b(?: break | case | do | done | else | esac | fi | for | if | in | then)\b
